oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Paddy Meagher's Ordinary and the Bell Tavern
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Meagher, Patrick; Bell Tavern; city planning; Overton, John; Jackson, Andrew; Winchester, James;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 15-page manuscript detailing early Memphis resident Patrick Meagher's professional life and his tavern, where the city of Memphis was laid out. Includes bibliography, maps and illustrations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Avery, Martha Jane Peeples
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: David Bowman, Ph.D. (Editor); Phillip Morris, M.F.A. (Illustrations)
